definitions.definition: Of, from, or pertaining to the United States of America , its people , or its culture .
examples: He married an American woman in order to get an American passport.

definitions.definition: Of, from, or pertaining to the Americas .
examples: This is pure American powder from the foothills of Colombia .

definitions.definition: Of, from, or pertaining to British North America .
Of, from, or pertaining to the indigenous inhabitants of the Americas .
Able to be exercised on any date between its issue and expiry .
definitions.label_groups: finance , of an option , not comparable

main_definition: Of, from, or pertaining to the United States of America , its people , or its culture .
secondary_definitions: ( uncommon ) Of, from, or pertaining to the Americas .
( historical ) Of, from, or pertaining to British North America .
( archaic ) Of, from, or pertaining to the indigenous inhabitants of the Americas .
( finance , of an option , not comparable ) Able to be exercised on any date between its issue and expiry .
